azure_region.description: Azure region where the deployment machines will be created<!-- [group:general_configuration] -->

deployment_name.description: Suffix string added to some of the infrastructure resources names such as the resource group (rsg-ha-sap-${deployment_name})<!-- [group:general_configuration] -->

os_admnistrator_name.description: Name of the user created in the machines<!-- [group:general_configuration] -->

ssh_authorized_key.description: SSH public key content that will be authorized to access the machines with azadmin username<!-- file_key [group:general_configuration] -->

storage_account_name.description: Azure storage account where the file share with the SAP installation software is located<!-- [group:general_configuration] -->

storage_account_key.description: Azure storage account access key<!-- password_key [group:general_configuration] -->

system_identifier.description: HANA system identifier. System identifier must be 3 letters string

instance_number.description: HANA system instance number. Instance number must be 2 digits string

sap_admin_password.description: SAP administrator password. It is used to access to the sidadm user<!-- password_key -->

deployment_type.description: Select if the deployment creates a Cluster with HANA system replication and HA capabilities or not<!-- Options=["HA","non HA"] -->

hana_installation_software_path.description: Path to the folder where the SAP HANA installation software is uploaded in the Storage account. It is composed of the file share name and the uploaded HANA folder or archive file. For example: myshare/51053381_part1.exe or myshare/51053381
